entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:33 p.m. EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 6:14 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain mixed with snow in the afternoon and ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:14 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
